channel.title: Warnings are final!
channel.description:
It seems that most of you seem to think apologizing will get your warning/moderation/mute removed if you apologize to the moderator. It doesn't work that way!
When a moderator warns you it's your responsibility to accept the punishments. You earned it after all. So please, don't pm us asking for the warning to be removed, unless you have complete proof there was a simple mis-conception.
Yz85Racer EDIT: l2spell Tico.
